name: The World Strikes Back
description:
Portland Summer Slow Jams - June 2018 made by Adrian, Chad, Kyla, Annie, Auberon, Wyatt, Orlando, and Jason.

Arrow keys to move, space bar to jump.

Tips for playing: If you get stuck at the bottom of the stairs on floor 1 of the first level, try hopping a bit to get through.

There is no win condition.  If you find yourself in a radioactive tub by the end, just consider yourself a winner!
